data.title: New Taxes Await for Kazakhstan's Beleaguered Bitcoin and Crypto Miners
data.text: The government of Kazakhstan has unveiled a package of measures aimed at further taxing the nation's Bitcoin (BTC) and crypto mining sector. The measures will involve tax hikes on electricity, a crackdown on unregistered miners, a tax on mining hardware, and the introduction of VAT charges on mining-related equipment sales.
